title: Careful while taking pics with mascots in malls
selftext:
We went to RCity mall(Ghatkopar, Mumbai) yesterday and there were two beautiful mascots. One of my teenage contact went and posed besides them for photograph. 

To my notice, there was a guy in the hidden sight, was taking photograph of all people posing with these mascots. When i went there and asked him to delete photo, to my surpise, his galery was full of such pictures!

There are in creasing cases of taking photograps of people without their knowledge. 

There will be some peoope still want to challenge saying all these is correct!! There will be definitely some who will make fun of the post. My post is for some people who dont like being photographed by unknowns!

Beware!!!
comments: Even if you feel uncomfortable or are not okay with being photographed there is nothing legally you can do as photography in public is legal. So all you can pretty much do is ask them and hope they delete it else no chance.
